casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Mary March EXUM. No. D-2998. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 2, 2017.

Mary March Exum, of Asheville, North Carolina, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring her to show cause why she should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
